description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nPica:
Your creatures have 7% more {STAT_attack} and {STAT_intelligence} for each resource-yielding object you've collected in the current Realm, up to a maximum of 15. If you're not in a Realm, this trait acts as if you've collected 10 objects. This trait does not stack.
name: Steampowered Sickle
